DB¶

implement interface to create and clean up tables

class prestest.db.DBManager(docker_folder)[source]¶

Bases: object

implement method to create, remove tables in testing framework.

create_table(table: str, query: str, file: Union[pathlib.PosixPath, str])[source]¶

create table based on the query and insert file into the table. this method intends to help set up tables used for testing. the database for the table will be created (but not dropped after)

Parameters

  • table – name of the table. for example, ‘sandbox.my_table’

  • query – a query used to create hive table.

  • file – a file inserted to the table. This will overwrite the table if it already exists.

Returns

None

drop_table(table: str)[source]¶

drop target table in container hive.

Parameters

table – name of the table.

Returns

None

read_sql(query: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Parameters

query – a presto query.

Returns

a dataframe containing the returned contents of the query.
